Gaining skills, facing adversity, and modernizing services delivery with Amenity Applewhite 🙋🏼

Jun 26, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • government
  • local government

This week we talk to Amenity Applewhite, Product Manager with the City of Austin. We chat about traversing through skill learning, facing adversity, and modernizing services delivery at the city.
